item.title: page Deprecated List
item.description: Deprecated List # Member DECLARE_ALIASED_RIVET_PLUGIN (clsname, alias) Prefer the RIVET_DECLARE_ALIASED_PLUGIN version with predictable RIVET_ prefix Member DECLARE_RIVET_PLUGIN (clsname) Prefer the RIVET_DECLARE_PLUGIN version with predictable RIVET_ prefix Member DEFAULT_RIVET_ANALYSIS_CONSTRUCTOR (clsname) Prefer the “CTOR” version Member DEFAULT_RIVET_ANALYSIS_CTOR (clsname) Prefer the RIVET_DEFAULT_ANALYSIS_CTOR version with predictable RIVET_ prefix Member Rivet::AnalysisHandler::beamIds () const Use standalone beamIds(ah.beams()), to clean AH interface Member Rivet::AnalysisHandler::dump (const string &dumpfile, int period) Prefer setAODump() Member Rivet::AnalysisHandler::setIgnoreBeams (bool ignore=true) Use checkBeams() Member Rivet::AnalysisHandler::sqrtS () const

item.title: page Todo List
item.description: Todo List # Module analysis_beamcompat Replace with beamsCompatible() with no args (calling beams() function internally) Add beamsMatch() methods with same (shared-code?) tolerance as in beamsCompatible() Module analysis_cbook Add “tmp” flags to book in standard temporary paths Module analysis_histopaths Add “tmp” flags to return /ANA/TMP/foo/bar paths Module analysis_manip Should really be protected: only public to keep BinnedHistogram happy for now… Module analysis_s2book REINSTATE Module particlebasetutils_pb2bool Move to FourMomentum functions Module particlebaseutils_kin
